formatDescription:
RF64 is a Broadcast Wave compatible multichannel file format enabling file sizes to exceed 4 GB. The file format is based on the Microsoft RIFF/WAVE format and Wave Format Extensible for multichannel parameters. Additions are made to the basic specification to allow for more than 4 GB file sizes when needed (the new maximum filesize is now approximately 16 exabytes).

An RF64 file containing the bext chunk becomes a Multichannel Broadcast Wave format. Further research is required to better understand this format. Users with samples are encouraged to contact the PRONOM team.
provenanceCompoundName: National Library of New Zealand / National Library of New Zealand

internalSignatures.name: RF64 MBWF
internalSignatures.note: BOF: RF64{4}WAVEds64 with bext chunk following at indeterminate point. Further research is required to refine this signature
